2.name: Illusion Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an Illusion spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Improved Minor Illusion
2.description: You can cast Minor Illusion without expending a spell slot or components, and you can create both a sound and an image with a single casting of the spell.

6.name: See Invisibility
6.description: Glimpse Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to you and your allies. (Recharge: Short rest)

10.name: Illusory Self
10.description: As a reaction, interpose an illusory duplicate of yourself between you and an attacker's strike, making them miss their attack. (Recharge: Short rest)
